short_summary: Muncho Lake Shoreline Protection on the Alaska Highway
description: Recent rain events in the months of June and July 2022 have resulted in historically high water levels and severe flooding in the region. Highway embankment at multiple locations along Muncho Lake has been subject to significant erosion. This project aims to repair the damaged sections of the highway and restore the highway embankment back to a safe condition for the travelling public.
duration_in_months: But matters related to Customs valuation place in High Potential for Non-Count
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### EZ899-231470 Muncho Lake Shoreline Protection, Alaska Highway, BC

**Reference Number:** WS3755264866-Doc3761422840

**Solicitation Number:** WS3755264866

**Publication Date:** 2022-11-22

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-07T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Project Overview

To address the significant erosion along the Muncho Lake shoreline on the Alaska Highway in British Columbia, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to bid on a project to repair and restore the damaged highway sections.

### Scope of Work

The project includes, but is not limited to, the following:

* Traffic accommodation and environmental protection measures
* Survey and field verification of existing erosion protection geometry and locations
* Removal of existing erosion protection and excavating embankments
* Supply and installation of riprap, gabion structures, road aggregate, and gravel surfacing
* Installation of log booms

### Criteria for Selection

Bidders will be selected based on the lowest price.

### Contract Details

* Contract Value: To Be Determined
* Contract Term: 2023-03-20
* Payment Terms: To Be Determined

### Contact Information

Donna Fung, (SPAC/PSPC)
donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14706998?extsite=MTQ3MDY5OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14706998?extsite=MTQ3MDY5OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notes

* Only submissions from qualified contractors will be considered.
* Bidders must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
